headline: Bloom Energy (BE) Sees Strong Share Price Momentum Amid Expectations For Strong Volumes
summary: Bloom Energy Corporation (NYSE:BE) is one of the best AI energy stocks to buy now. On January 16, 2026, shares of Bloom Energy Corporation (NYSE:BE) surged to an all-time high of $147.93. Over the past year, the shares have climbed 470.43% as investor momentum remains strong amid the company’s growing role in next-generation, distributed power […]
